title: I am the other 95, welcome to my channel
description:
Seeking truth through intelligent discourse and fresh perspectives; adding a voice to the silent majority discussion 

follow me on:
twitter: @theother_95
instagram: @theother95
facebook: @theother95page

email me at theotherninetyfive@gmail.com
